pages.text: 21|45|Bigu: “Man faqat sumoro ʙa vasilai vahj [az azoʙi ilohi] ʙim mediham” va [-le] cun ʙa karon ʙim doda savad, da'vati [haq]-ro namesunavand
21|46|Agar andake az azoʙi Parvardigorat ʙa onon ʙirasad, hatman, megujand: “Ej voj ʙar mo [ki], jaqinan, sitamgor ʙudaem!”

21|47|Ruzi qijomat Mo tarozuhoi adlro [ʙaroi hisoʙrasi dar mijon] menihem, pas, ʙa hec kas [kamtarin] sitame namesavad va agar [kirdorason] hamsangi donai xardale ʙosad, onro [ʙa hisoʙ] meovarem va kofist, ki Mo hisoʙras ʙosem
21|48|Ba rosti, Mo ʙa Muso va Horun kitoʙ [Tavrot] dodem va [in kitoʙ] ʙaroi parhezkoron ravsani va andarze ast
21|49|[Hamon] kasone, ki dar nihon az Parvardigorason metarsand va az qijomat ʙimnokand
21|50|Va in [Qur'on] pandi muʙorake ast, ki onro nozil kardem. Ojo [ʙoz ham] inkoras mekuned
21|51|Va ʙe tardid, pes az on Mo ʙa Iʙrohim [rusdi fikri va] hidojatasro ato kardem va ʙa [soistagihoi] u dono ʙudem
21|52|On goh ki ʙa padari xud va qavmas guft: “In mucassamaho cist, ki ʙa parastisi onho istodaed?”
21|53|Onon guftand: “Mo padaronamonro didem, ki onhoro meparastidand”
21|54|[Iʙrohim] Guft: “Hatman, sumo va padaronaton dar gumrohii oskor ʙudaed”
21|55|Onon guftand: “Ojo [suxani] haq ʙarojamon ovardai jo suxi mekuni?”
21|56|U guft: “Balki [suxanam haq ast] Parvardigoraton parvardigori osmonho va zamin ast, hamon ki onhoro padid ovardaast va man ʙar in [suxan] guvoham”
21|57|Va [ʙo xud guft] “Ba Alloh taolo savgand, pas az on ki pust karded va [ʙa casn] rafted, ʙaroi [noʙudii] ʙuthojaton tadʙire meandesam”
